file_content.text: [You examine the datapad and discover the mission parameters for "Operation Black Haze."]
The Empire has procured a Republic warhead from [REDACTED]. In less than twenty-five hours, they will detonate it in Corellia's government district.
Your primary objective: Disarm the warhead. Supplied ion charges will nullify the ordnance with minimal detonation risk.
[REDACTED] recommends use of all issued charges to ensure success. Stop the detonation, and help us save Corellia.
[Someone ambushed this team before they reached their objective. It should be possible to take out the warhead if you can gather all of the ion charges.]
